mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT FROM board_notice
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM),0) AS num FROM board_notice

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount, to_char(board_notice.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as regdate,profile, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_notice INNER JOIN users ON board_notice.writer=users.id ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount, to_char(board_notice.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as regdate,profile, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_notice INNER JOIN users ON board_notice.writer=users.id ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_notice (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num,writer,title,viewCount,to_char(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as regdate FROM board_notice WHERE num IN(SELECT MAX(NUM) FROM board_notice)
